hero.title: Hello, I'm Yudistira Eka Pratama
hero.description: I possess a solid foundation in Software Engineering, specializing in web development by leveraging Angular for front-end architecture and Laravel for back-end solutions. I meticulously design dynamic user interfaces and engineer robust applications that address the complexities of modern web demands, ensuring seamless interactions between front-end and back-end components, along with efficient database management using MySQL. Additionally, I excel in Multi-Platform App Development with Dart and Flutter, employing state management techniques such as GetX and bLoc. As a versatile Full Stack Developer, I am committed to delivering tailored solutions that meet project objectives. For further insights into my background, please download my CV.
